I kena alot of shit when I first started doing llm last Yr. Then came to realise no pt gg thru Cs for alot of stuff  unless it's major shit. Even when resto late  unless it's late by very long  I also tell myself sua  not worth getting angry or stress. This job can get a decent income  but it's not gg to net me a super high income. So don't want give myself hbp over all the shit. Even if recipient cb or scold. I just 1 ear in n out. As long as I didn't do anytg wrong  I just f care all the other shit
